attributes.action: ban the practising of the Muslim faith in the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ban the practising of the Muslim faith in the United Kingdom."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14346.asp

Prime Minister's Office
